original: mahāpaṇḍitaniḥsaṁgācāryakuladattaviracitā kriyāsaṁgrahapañjikā 1-4 bhūmiparīkṣā tatra śubhe divasavārādau pūjāpuraḥsaraṁ bhūmiparīkṣā kāryā  #
1-4-1 parityājyā bhūmiḥ [1] yady aniṣṭavṛkṣādiyuktā bhūs tadā sā parityayājyā |
analyzed: parityājyā bhūmiḥ yadi aniṣṭa vṛkṣa ādi yuktā bhūḥ tadā sā

tatas ca yasyām bhuvi pūrva ādi dikṣu anukrameṇa aśvattha arjuna plakṣa palāśa nyadrodha śālmalī bakula udumbara sakaṇṭaka vṛkṣāḥ putra strī dhana viyoga śatru bhaya vitta nāśa strī durācāra parijana parihaṇa dhānya ādi vrīhi vināśa doṣa dā  /
sā bhavati iti varjyā

original: tad uktaṁ aindryāṁ nyased vaṭam udumbaram eva yām yāṁ kurvīta pippalam athāpi ca paścimena |
analyzed: tat uktam aindryām nyaset vaṭam udumbaram eva yām yām kurvīta pippalam atha api ca paścimena

original: plakṣaṁ tathottaradiśāsu śubhāni kuryād viparyayaṁ punar ime'pi viparyayasthāḥ ||
analyzed: plakṣam tathā uttara diśāsu śubhāni kuryāt viparyayam punar ime api viparyaya sthāḥ
iti

yāḥ ca dharāḥ daṇḍa śakaṭa sūrya pannaga kūrma cāpa bṛhanmukha muraja trikoṇa vyajana ākāra paṅka garta viṣama bahavaḥ tāḥ khalu paśu dhana dhānya kṣaya cakṣūḥ roga bandhana pīḍana caura agni bhaya artha strī nāśa nṛpa bhī vitta nāśa dāridrya śoka doṣa dā
bhavanti

original: [3] yā apy agniyamarakṣombuvāyudikplavās tā niyamena dāhamṛtyurogadaridratvaripuvardhanāni kurvanti bhūmayaḥ |
analyzed: yāḥ api agni yama rakṣaḥ umbu vāyu diś plavāḥ tāḥ niyamena dāha mṛtyu roga daridra tva ripu vardhanāni kurvanti bhūmayaḥ

original: [4] yā ca bhūḥ śvaśṛgāloṣṭrabhinnabhāṇḍasvanā sāśubhadā bhavati |
analyzed: yā ca bhūḥ śva śṛgāla uṣṭra bhinna bhāṇḍa svanā sā aśubha dā bhavati
vasā taila kṣāra pakṣi gandhā ca manī aniṣṭa phala dā
yajña sthāna śmaśāna bahu uraga vivarā ca bhūḥ varjanīyā

original: nāgahradacaityādyāśramadevatāyatanāni ca yatra santi sā ca bhūr vigarhitā |
analyzed: nāgahrada caitya ādi āśrama devatāyatanāni ca yatra santi sā ca bhūḥ vigarhitā

original: [7] yatra cācalāyāṁ dikṣu vidikṣu ca yatra tatrāpi kaṇṭakavṛkṣalatāviṭapaśuṣkavṛkṣāḥ santi sā cāpraśastā iti |
analyzed: yatra ca acalāyām dikṣu vidikṣu ca yatra tatra api kaṇṭaka vṛkṣa latā viṭapa śuṣka vṛkṣāḥ santi sā ca apraśastā iti
bhū śubha lakṣaṇāni tatas śubha lakṣaṇāni
yāḥ anantāḥ bhadrāsana āyata vṛtta caturasrāḥ tāḥ akṛtārtha siddhi prada buddhi vardhana dhana dhānya dāyinyaḥ bhavanti

original: [2] yāś ca pūrvottareśadikplavās tāḥ śrīmatyaḥ sukhakāriṇyo bhavanti |
analyzed: yāḥ ca pūrva uttara īśa diś plavāḥ tāḥ śrīmatyaḥ sukha kāriṇyaḥ bhavanti

original: yatra ca rasāyām uttaradigbhāge sarovaraḥ sitaraktakusumitapadmaṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaḥ,
analyzed: yatra ca rasāyām uttara digbhāge sarovaraḥ sita rakta kusumita padma ṣaṇḍa maṇḍitaḥ
abhipracura nīlotpala kumuda saugandhika ādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ sa chāditaḥ
viṣeṣataḥ nānā pakṣi gaṇa ākīrṇaḥ matsya kacchapa ādi paripūritaḥ sadā harita tṛṇa sayuktaḥ ca iti
pūrva digbhāge āmra jambu kadambakāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ santi

original: tatraivāntare javābandhūkāmilādayaḥ puṣpaviṭapā yāvanto raktapuṣpaviṭapāś ceti;
analyzed: tatra eva antare javā bandhūkāmila ādayaḥ puṣpa viṭapāḥ yāvantaḥ rakta puṣpa viṭapāḥ ca iti

original: evaṁ dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi punnāganāgakesarapārijātakacampakāśokā viśeṣato bakulavṛkṣāḥ santi,
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām diśi punnāga nāgakesara pārijātaka campaka aśokāḥ viśeṣataḥ bakula vṛkṣāḥ santi

original: tatrāntare jātīkundamallikāsugandhataravaḥ santi yāvantaḥ sitapuṣpaviṭapāś ceti;
analyzed: tatra antare jātī kunda mallikā sugandha taravaḥ santi yāvantaḥ sitapuṣpa viṭapāḥ ca iti
tathā paścimasyām diśi pippala udumbara lakuca panasa vṛkṣāḥ santi

original: yāvantaḥ kṣīrataravas te sarve paścime praśastāḥ,
analyzed: yāvantaḥ kṣīra taravaḥ te sarve paścime praśastāḥ
tatra antare kṛṣṇa puṣpa viṭapāḥ praśastāḥ

original: [3] api ca sāmānyena vīṇāveṇuvṛṣabhadundubhisvanā vibhūtikāriṇī bhūḥ syāt |
analyzed: api ca sāmānyena vīṇā veṇu vṛṣabha dundubhi svanā vibhūti kāriṇī bhūḥ syāt
viśeṣataḥ kula anurūpataḥ viśvabharā grāhyā

original: tadyathā sitavarṇā dadhidugdhaghṛtādigandhā madhurarasā brāhmaṇānāṁ yogyā |
analyzed: tat yathā sita varṇā dadhi dugdha ghṛta ādi gandhā madhura rasā brāhmaṇānām yogyā
rakta varṇā mallikā kamala utpala campaka nāgakesara ādi gandhā kaṣāya rasā kṣatriyāṇām
pīta varṇāḥ madya gaja mada gandhāḥ āmla rasāḥ vaiśyānām
śyāma varṇā nirgandhā kaṭu tikta rasā śūdrāṇām

original: hastamātraṁ khanitvā tayaiva mṛdā gartam āpūrya nyūnādhikasamā yāḥ sthitās tā adhomottamamadhyamāḥ |
analyzed: hasta mātram khanitvā tayā eva mṛdā gartam āpūrya nyūna adhika samāḥ yāḥ sthitāḥ tāḥ adhas ma uttama madhyamāḥ

original: athavā caturasraṁ dvihastapramāṇaṁ gartaṁ nikhanya tanmadhye maṇḍalakaṁ kṛtvā pūrvasyāṁ diśi sitavarṇakusumaṁ sthāpayet |
analyzed: athavā catur asram dvi hasta pramāṇam gartam nikhanya tad madhye maṇḍalakam kṛtvā pūrvasyām diśi sita varṇa kusumam sthāpayet
evam paścima uttara yama dikṣu rakta pīta nīlāni kusumāni sthāpayet

original: yaiṣāṁ na mlāyate sā tadyogyā bhavati |
analyzed: yā eṣām na mlāyate sā tad yogyā bhavati

original: tatraiva garte pūrvādidikṣv āmakumbhopari pakvaśarāvakeṣu sitādivartibhir gavyājyaiḥ pradīpam ujjvālya parikṣayet |
analyzed: tatra eva garte pūrva ādi dikṣu āma kumbha upari pakva śarāvakeṣu sitā ādi vartibhiḥ gavya ājyaiḥ pradīpam ujjvālya parikṣayet

original: tatra yadi sitavartiḥ prajvalati tadā sā bhūr brāhmaṇānāṁ yogyā |
analyzed: tatra yadi sita vartiḥ prajvalati tadā sā bhūḥ brāhmaṇānām yogyā

original: evaṁ raktapītakṛṣṇānāṁ yathāsaṁkhyaṁ kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṁ bhavati sā bhūḥ |
analyzed: evam rakta pīta kṛṣṇānām yathāsakhyam kṣatriya vaiśya śūdrāṇām bhavati sā bhūḥ

original: evaṁ kuśaśarośīradūrvābahulā dharā anukrameṇa brāhmaṇādīnāṁ yogyāḥ |
analyzed: evam kuśa śara uśīra dūrvā bahulāḥ dharāḥ anukrameṇa brāhmaṇa ādīnām yogyāḥ
keṣāṃcid mate mahā nadīnām uttara kūle
keṣāñcid māte dakṣiṇa kūle nagara ādi avadhāraṇam

original: 1-4-3 (the case that a suitable ground is not found)
analyzed: the case that a suitable ground is not found

original: evaṁ yathoktalakṣaṇānāṁ dharaṇīnām abhāve yathāprāptāyā viśuddhāyāḥ kṣoṇyāḥ svajātisaṁpādanaṁ kṛtvā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ |
analyzed: evam yathā ukta lakṣaṇānām dharaṇīnām abhāve yathāprāptāyāḥ viśuddhāyāḥ kṣoṇyāḥ sva jāti sapādanam kṛtvā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: 3-3 kalaśasthādhivāsanā parikramānantaraṁ yathāvidhivartitamaṇḍale pañcopacārapūjābhiḥ paripūjite kalaśān adhivāsayet |
analyzed: kalaśa sthā adhivāsanā parikrama anantaram yathāvidhi vartita maṇḍale pañca upacāra pūjābhiḥ paripūjite kalaśān adhivāsayet

original: 3-3-1 pakṣatrayam tatra tripañcāśad ekādaśa pañca vā |
analyzed: pakṣa trayam tatra tripañcāśat ekādaśa pañca vā

original: 3-3-1-1 tripañcāśatpakṣaḥ tripañcāśatpakṣe sarvamāṇḍaleyānāṁ pratyekaṁ sārvakarmikakalaśena catuḥpañcāśat |
analyzed: tripañcāśat pakṣaḥ tripañcāśat pakṣe sarva māṇḍaleyānām pratyekam sārvakarmika kalaśena catuḥpañcāśat
ekādaśa pakṣaḥ ekādaśa pakṣe mahāvairocana sattva vajri ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
akṣobhya ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
ratna sabhava ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
amita abha ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
amoghasiddhi ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
lāsya ādi catuṣṭayānām ekaḥ
dhūpa ādi catuṣṭayānām ekaḥ
vajrāṅkuśa maitreya ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
vajrapāśa gandha hasti ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
vajrasphoṭa amitaprabha ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
vajrāveśa vajragarbha ādi pañcānām ekaḥ
sārvakarmika kalaśena saha dvādaśa
pañca pakṣaḥ pañca pakṣe vairocana ādi pañca tathāgata sattva vajri ādi catur devatī navānām ekaḥ
lāsya ādi aṣṭa devatīnām ekaḥ
vajrasattva ādi ṣoḍaśa bodhisattvānām ekaḥ
maitreya ādi ṣoḍaśa bodhisattvānām ekaḥ
vajrāṅkuśa ādi catur krodhānām ekaḥ
sārvakarmika kalaśena saha ṣaṭ
sārvakarmika kalaśa lakṣaṇam tatra sārvakarmika kalaśasya lakṣaṇam
garbhaḥ vṛttena ūnapañcāśat mātrikaḥ
oṣṭha antam yāvat ucchrāyaḥ ekaviśati mātrikaḥ
tad adhas lambamānaḥ oṣṭhaḥ dvi mātrikaḥ
trayodaśa mātrayā mukha randhram
adhas kaṇṭha randhram sārdha pañca mātrikam
pāda adhikā aṣṭa mātrikā grīvā uccam tiryak
adhoṣṭhaḥ sa pāda ṣoḍaśa mātrikaḥ
meditation tat anu tīrtha ambu pañcaratna oṣadhī vrīhi gandha garbhān vilasat pallava ānanān sa mālya vastra ambara kandharān dhvaja āta patra suvarṇa tilaka dvi netra alaktaka yajñopavītaiḥ
upaśobhitān lāja akṣata kusumbha phalinī pūga paripūrita udarān navīna darbha kṛta kuṇḍala āsana sthān sārvakarmika mantra adhiṣṭhita dūrvā kunda āpatita gomaya sita sarṣapaiḥ
kṛta rakṣān

original: tatra samāhitaḥ sann ācāryo jhaṭiti vaṁkārapariṇatanānāratnamayaṁ kalaśam ākārajaśukladharmodayāntarasthaṁ vibhāvya,
analyzed: tatra samāhitaḥ san ācāryaḥ jhaṭiti vakāra pariṇata nānā ratna mayam kalaśam ākāra ja śukla dharma udaya antara stham vibhāvya

original: tad anu svasvabījacihnapariṇāmena svasvadevatāṁ vicintya svahṛdbījamayūkhāṅkuśair jñānasattvam ānīya purato dṛṣṭvā pādyācamanādikaṁ ca dadyāt
analyzed: tat anu sva sva bīja cihna pariṇāmena sva sva devatām vicintya sva hṛd bīja mayūkha aṅkuśaiḥ jñāna sattvam ānīya puratas dṛṣṭvā pādya ācamana ādikam ca dadyāt

original: tac ca samayasattve praveśya mahārāgeṇa dravībhūya bodhicittarūpāmṛtībhūtaṁ cintayet |
analyzed: tat ca samaya sattve praveśya mahā rāgeṇa dravībhūya bodhi citta rūpa amṛtībhūtam cintayet
cihne ca samaya devatām jñāna devatayā ekībhūtām cintayet

original: tato vajrāsaktapuṣpamālāntaṁ pañcasūtraṁ vajraghaṇṭāsahitavāmamuṣṭyā gṛhītvā oṁ sarvatathāgatamahāyogīśvara hūṁ iti cakreśasya hṛdayamantreṇa
analyzed: tatas vajra āsakta puṣpa mālā antam pañca sūtram vajra ghaṇṭā sahita vāma muṣṭyā gṛhītvā om sarva tathāgata mahā yogi īśvara   iti cakreśasya hṛdayamantreṇa

original: oṁ vajrayakṣa hūṁ iti sārvakarmikamantreṇa ca tridhābhimantrya punar vajrayakṣamantreṇaivābhimantritapuṣpatrayaṁ nikṣipya,
analyzed: om vajrayakṣa hūm iti sārvakarmika mantreṇa ca tridhā abhimantrya punar vajrayakṣa mantreṇa eva abhimantrita puṣpa trayam nikṣipya
sva sva mantreṇa aṣṭottaraśatam japet

original: tad anu vijayādighaṭān puṣpādibhiḥ saṁpūjya sārvakarmikakalaśavāriṇābhyukṣya baliṁ ca dattvā'sarvavyāpi'tyādistutipuraḥsaraṁ ghaṇṭāṁ vādayet
analyzed: tat anu vijaya ādi ghaṭān puṣpa ādibhiḥ sapūjya sārvakarmika kalaśa vāriṇā abhyukṣya balim ca dattvā a sarva vyāpi ityādi stuti puraḥsaram ghaṇṭām vādayet
sarva vyāpi bhava agra agrya sugata adhipate jina
traidhātuka mahā rāja vairocana namaḥ astu te

original: [1] namas te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya te namaḥ |
analyzed: namaḥ te vajra sattvāya vajra ratnāya te namaḥ

original: namas te vajradharmāya namas te vajrakarmaṇe ||
analyzed: namaḥ te vajra dharmāya namaḥ te vajra karmaṇe

original: [2] tatas tebhyaḥ kalaśebhyaḥ stokastokam udakam ādāya sārvakarmikakalaśe prakṣipet |
analyzed: tatas tebhyaḥ kalaśebhyaḥ stoka stokam udakam ādāya sārvakarmika kalaśe prakṣipet

original: yasyācāryasya vajradhātau nādhimokṣas tasya sveṣṭadevatādhimokṣeṇa bhūśodhanapratiṣṭhāparyanteṣu sarvakriyākaraṇam aviruddham |
analyzed: yasya ācāryasya vajradhātau na adhimokṣaḥ tasya sva iṣṭadevatā adhimokṣeṇa bhū śodhana pratiṣṭhā paryanteṣu sarva kriyā karaṇam aviruddham
kalaśa sthāpanam idānīm kalaśa sthāpanam abhidhīyate

original: tatra maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāram ārabhya dakṣiṇāvartena vijayakalaśādīn akṣobhyakalaśaparyantān nyaset |
analyzed: tatra maṇḍalasya pūrva dvāram ārabhya dakṣiṇa āvartena vijaya kalaśa ādīn akṣobhya kalaśa paryantān nyaset
pūrva dvāre cakreśasya vijaya kalaśam tad anukrameṇa
trayodaśa kalaśāni
evam dakṣiṇa dvāram ārabhya
trayodaśa kalaśāni
tathā paścima dvāram ārabhya amita ābha vajrasphoṭa vajrahetu vajrabhāṣa bhadrapāla jālinīprabha vajragītā dharmavajrī vajradīpā vajragarbha akṣaya mati vajrarakṣa vajrakarmaṇām
trayodaśa kalaśāni
tathā eva uttara dvāram ārabhya amogha siddhi vajra āveśa vajrayakṣa vajra sadhi pratibhāna kūṭa samantabhadra vajra nṛtyākarma vajrī vajragandhā maitreya amogha darṣi vajrarāja vajrasattva akṣobhya
caturdaśa kalaśāni

original: sārvakarmikakalaśaṁ tu bāhyadigapekṣayeśānakoṇe kalaśapaṅkter abhyantare sthāpanīyam |
analyzed: sārvakarmika kalaśam tu bāhya diś apekṣayā īśāna koṇe kalaśa paṅkteḥ abhyantare sthāpanīyam

original: iti prāgadhivāsitakalaśānāṁ maṇḍalacakram ekaikaṁ pradakṣiṇaṁ kārayitvā maṇḍalacakrasya cakravāḍajvālāvalībhūmer bahiḥ kalaśānāṁ sthāpanam
analyzed: iti prāc adhivāsita kalaśānām maṇḍala cakram ekaikam pradakṣiṇam kārayitvā maṇḍala cakrasya cakravāḍa jvālā āvalī bhūmeḥ bahis kalaśānām sthāpanam
kalaśa nyāsa kāle api prajñāpāramitā ādi mahāyāna sūtrāṇi pāṭhayitavyāni
karpūra aguru turuṣka ādi dhūpa ghaṭikā pradīpa ādibhiḥ api maṇḍalam pūjayet

original: 3-5 sūtrapātanam 3-5-1 pañca pañca sūtrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni tato maṇḍaleśayogavān ācārya ākāśe sarvatathāgatān avalambya saṁpūjyākṣatakanyākartitāni  #
analyzed: sūtra pātanam pañca pañca sūtrāṇi adhiṣṭhitāni tatas maṇḍala īśa yogavān ācāryaḥ ākāśe sarva tathāgatān avalambya sa pūjya akṣata kanyā kartitāni

original: vīrakrayakrītāni vā pañca pañca sūtrāṇi sitapītaraktaharitakṛṣṇair varṇakaiḥ pṛthak pṛthag rañjitāni vuṁ-āṁ-jrīṁ-khaṁ-hūṁ iti pañcatathāgatabījaniṣpannāni  #
analyzed: vīra kraya krītāni vā pañca pañca sūtrāṇi sita pīta rakta harita kṛṣṇaiḥ varṇakaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak rañjitāni iti pañca tathāgata bīja niṣpannāni
taiḥ eva adhitiṣṭhet

original: 3-5-2 pañcatathāgataṁ prārthayet tad anu ākāśasthapañcatathāgatahṛdayeṣu vuṁkārādibījaniṣpannāni jñānasūtrāṇi raśmimayāni dṛṣṭvā,
analyzed: pañcatathāgatam prārthayet tat anu ākāśa stha pañca tathāgata hṛdayeṣu vukāra ādi bīja niṣpannāni jñāna sūtrāṇi raśmi mayāni dṛṣṭvā

original: oṁ āḥ śāśvata vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 1)
analyzed: om āḥ śāśvata vajra sūtram me prayaccha
iti anena mahāvairocanam prārthayet

original: evam, oṁ āḥ ratneśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 2)
analyzed: evam om āḥ ratneśa vajra sūtram me prayaccha hūm

original: oṁ āḥ amiteśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 3)
analyzed: om āḥ amiteśa vajra sūtram me prayaccha

original: oṁ āḥ amogheśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 4)
analyzed: om āḥ amogha īśa vajra sūtram me prayaccha

original: oṁ āḥ citteśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 5)
analyzed: om āḥ citteśa vajra sūtram me prayaccha
iti anena
ratna śādīn
prārthayet

original: 3-5-3 sūtrāṇi pañcaviṁśatyā bheditāni jato jaḥkārapītacandrasūryasvarūpacakṣurdvayaḥ oṁ dīptadṛṣṭyaṅkuśi jaḥ ( 6)
analyzed: sūtrāṇi pañcaviśatyā bheditāni jataḥ jaḥ kāra pīta candra sūrya sva rūpa cakṣuḥ dvayaḥ om dīpta dṛṣṭi aṅkuśi jaḥ

original: ity uccārya pradrutapracalaccakṣuḥpakṣmākarṣaṇalocanayā dīptadṛṣṭyāṅkuśeneva tāni vairocanādibhiḥ preṣitāny ākṛṣya tatraiva svasvavarṇasūtreṣv  #
analyzed: iti uccārya pradruta pracalat cakṣuḥ pakṣma ākarṣaṇa locanayā dīpta dṛṣṭyā aṅkuśena iva tāni vairocana ādibhiḥ preṣitāni ākṛṣya tatra eva sva sva varṇa sūtreṣu
antar niveśayet

original: ata eva tāny ādarśādipañcajñānamayāny ādarśajñānādīnāṁ ca pratyekaṁ caturjñānānugamāt pañcaviṁśatyā bheditāni bhavati |
analyzed: atas eva tāni ādarśa ādi pañca jñāna mayāni ādarśa jñāna ādīnām ca pratyekam catur jñāna anugamāt pañcaviśatyā bheditāni bhavati

original: 3-5-4 ekasūtraṁ valayet tad anu sārvakarmikarūpeṇa karmācāryeṇa sūtradhāriṇā saha prathamaṁ pañcapañcasūtrair ekaikaṁ sūtraṁ valayet |
analyzed: eka sūtram valayet tat anu sārvakarmika rūpeṇa karma ācāryeṇa sūtradhāriṇā saha prathamam pañca pañca sūtraiḥ ekaikam sūtram valayet

original: tad anu tathāvalitaiḥ pañcabhir ekasūtram oṁ anyonyānugatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ parasparānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmā atyantānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
analyzed: tat anu tathā āvalitaiḥ pañcabhiḥ eka sūtram om anyonya anugatāḥ sarva dharmāḥ paraspara anupraviṣṭāḥ sarva dharmāḥ atyanta anupraviṣṭāḥ sarva dharmāḥ
om āḥ hūm
iti uccārayan valayet

original: 3-5-5 brahmasūtrapātanam valanānantaram upaviśya suvarṇādibhājane nidhāya gandhapuṣpadhūpaiś cābhyarcya sārvakarmikamantreṇārakṣya,
analyzed: brahmasūtra pātanam valana anantaram upaviśya suvarṇa ādi bhājane nidhāya gandha puṣpa dhūpaiḥ ca abhyarcya sārvakarmika mantreṇa ārakṣya
om vajra samaya sūtram mā atikrama hūm
iti anena aṣṭottaraśata vāram adhivāsayet
punar om sarvaśodhani hūm phaṭ

original: iti mantreṇa sarvakumbhodakeṇa saṁprokṣya puṣpair avakīrya gaganatalagateṣṭadevatāmaṇḍalam avalambyārghadānapuraḥsaraṁ saṁpūjya natvā svayaṁ  #
analyzed: iti mantreṇa sarva kumbha udakeṇa sa prokṣya puṣpaiḥ avakīrya gagana tala gata iṣṭadevatā maṇḍalam avalambya argha dāna puraḥsaram sapūjya natvā svayam

original: tadyogavān uttarasādhakaṁ sārvakarmikarūpaṁ vicintya svasya tasya ca vāmetaracakṣuṣor jjaḥkārajau pītāvabhāsau candrasūryau dhyātvā sūtraṁ vāmavajramuṣṭinā  #
analyzed: tad yogavān uttarasādhakam sārvakarmika rūpam vicintya svasya tasya ca vāmetara cakṣuṣoḥ jjaḥkāra jau pīta avabhāsau candra sūryau dhyātvā sūtram vāma vajra muṣṭinā

original: gṛhītaṁ nābhau dhārayan taṁ cottarasādhakaṁ tathaiva gṛhītasūtraṁ “jjaḥ-jjaḥ-jjaḥ“ iti jjaḥkārais tribhiḥ saṁpreṣyottarasādhake “jjaḥ-jjaḥ-jjaḥ“  #
analyzed: gṛhītam nābhau dhārayan tam ca uttara sādhakam tathā eva gṛhīta sūtram jjaḥ jjaḥ jjaḥ iti jjaḥkāraiḥ tribhiḥ sa preṣya uttara sādhake  /

original: iti trijjaḥkāraiś cākṛṣya tathaivābhimukhaṁ sthite paścimadiksthaḥ pūrvadiṅmukho dakṣiṇadikṣtha uttaradiṅmukho brahmasūtradvayaṁ nābhisame'ntarīkṣe  #
analyzed: iti trijjaḥkāraiḥ ca ākṛṣya tathā eva abhimukham sthite paścima diś sthaḥ pūrva diś mukhaḥ dakṣiṇa diś sthaḥ uttara diś mukhaḥ brahmasūtra dvayam nābhi same antarīkṣe  /
pātayan sa vajra dakṣiṇa kara aṅgulībhyām sūtram ādāya ācchaṭā dhvanim kuryāt
sarva sūtra pāteṣu ca
om vajra samaya sūtram mā atikrama hūm
hūm om āḥ
iti uccārayet

original: tena ca sūtradhvaninā sarvākāśavyāpinas tathāgatān saṁcodayet |
analyzed: tena ca sūtra dhvaninā sarva ākāśa vyāpinaḥ tathāgatān sa codayet
te ca āgatya sūtreṣu antar bhavanti

original: asya hi dhvaneḥ sattvārthe bhavatāṁ kālas tad ihāgamyatām iti sāṁketiko'rthaḥ |
analyzed: asya hi dhvaneḥ sattva arthe bhavatām kālaḥ tat iha āgamyatām iti sāketikaḥ arthaḥ

original: sarvatra cācārya uttarasādhakaś ca pradakṣiṇaṁ gacchet |
analyzed: sarvatra ca ācāryaḥ uttarasādhakaḥ ca pradakṣiṇam gacchet
sarva diś sama tām ca adhimuñcet

original: khasūtradvayavad bhūmau brahmasūtradvayam ubhayoḥ samaṁ lambitābhyāṁ sasūtrahastābhyāṁ pātanīyam |
analyzed: kha sūtra dvaya vat bhūmau brahmasūtra dvayam ubhayoḥ samam lambitābhyām sa sūtra hastābhyām pātanīyam

original: 3-5-6 diṅmūlapārśvasūtrapātanam tataṣ ṭakkikīlakāvasthito vajravidāraṇakīlakābhimukhaḥ pūrvadiksutraṁ pātayet |
analyzed: diś mūla pārśva sūtra pātanam tatas ṭakki kīlaka avasthitaḥ vajra vidāraṇa kīlaka abhimukhaḥ pūrva diś sutram pātayet

original: tad anu vajrāntacarakīlakagato vajrāṭṭahāsakīlakābhimukhaḥ pūrvamūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
analyzed: tat anu vajra anta cara kīlaka gataḥ vajra aṭṭahāsa kīlaka abhimukhaḥ pūrva mūla sūtram pātayet
tatas mahābala krodha kīlaka gataḥ ratna śikhara kīlaka abhimukhaḥ paścima diś sūtram pātayet

original: tad anu padanikṣepakīlakāvasthito vajrapalālakīlakābhimukhaḥ paścimamūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
analyzed: tat anu pada nikṣepa kīlaka avasthitaḥ vajra palāla kīlaka abhimukhaḥ paścima mūla sūtram pātayet
tatas vajra pracaṇḍa mahā krodha kīlaka sthaḥ vajrācala kīlaka mukhe uttara diś sutram pātayet

original: tad anu vajrabhīmakīlakastho vajravidrāpakakīlakamukha uttaramūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
analyzed: tat anu vajra bhīma kīlaka sthaḥ vajra vidrāpaka kīlaka mukhe uttara mūla sūtram pātayet
tatas vajrapāśa mahā krodhakīlaka gataḥ vajra amṛta kuṇḍali mahā krodhakīlaka mukhaḥ pārśva sūtram pātayet
tatas vajra āveśa kīlaka gataḥ prajñāntaka kīlaka mukhaḥ pārśva sūtram pātayet

original: tad anu padmāntakakīlakastho vajrāṅkuśakīlakamukhaḥ pārśvasūtraṁ pātayet |
analyzed: tat anu padmāntaka kīlaka sthaḥ vajrāṅkuśa kīlaka mukhaḥ pārśva sūtram pātayet
tatas yamāntaka kīlaka sthaḥ vajrasphoṭa kīlaka mukhaḥ pārśva sūtram pātayet
sarva sūtra pātane pratyekam pradakṣiṇatas gatvā pātayet
tatas sūtra pātana avasāne nairṛtya koṇa gataḥ iśāna abhimukhaḥ bali pūjā puraḥsaram
om āḥ   vajra muḥ

original: iti jñānasūtraṁ visarjya nabhaḥsthatathāgatahṛtsu niveśya pañcaraṅgikasūtraṁ yathāsthāne sthāpayet |
analyzed: iti jñāna sūtram visarjya nabhaḥstha tathāgata hṛtsu niveśya pañcaraṅgika sūtram yathāsthāne sthāpayet

original: iti sūtrapātanakramaḥ 3-5-7 nimittoktiḥ animittair asiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ iti vacanān nimittāny upalakṣayet |
analyzed: iti sūtra pātana kramaḥ nimitta uktiḥ animittaiḥ asiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ iti vacanāt nimittāni upalakṣayet
liṅgāni sūtra chedana rodana sūtra samullaṅghana gātra sparśana nāma sa kīrtana ādīni
tatra sūtra chedanena ācāryasya maraṇam
śva śṛgāla gṛdhra kaṅka rutaiḥ yajamānasya maraṇam āhuḥ
mārjāreṇa sūtra laṅghane tad asthi rāsabhasya vā
gardabhena laṅghane tad asthi
kukkureṇa laṅghane tad asthi

original: ajāvibhyāṁ laṅghane tayor asthi gor asthi vā |
analyzed: aja avibhyām laṅghane tayoḥ asthi goḥ asthi vā
aśvena aśva asthi
hastinā hasti asthi uṣṭra asthi vā
aśvatareṇa tat asthi
mahiṣeṇa śṛgāla asthi
mṛgeṇa mṛga asthi
ṛkṣeṇa ṛkṣa asthi
varāheṇa vyāghra asthi
vyāghreṇa gaja asthi
mūṣakeṇa mūṣaka asthi
sarpeṇa sarpa asthi
kacchapena kacchapa asthi

original: [4] śiraḥkaṇḍūyanaṁ yady ācāryaśilpiyajamānatanniyogijanānāṁ madhye kaścit karoti tadaikapauruṣād adhaḥ śalyam asti |
analyzed: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanam yadi ācārya śilpi yajamāna tad niyogi janānām madhye kaścid karoti tadā eka pauruṣāt adhas śalyam asti
bhrū sparśe suvarṇam hasta trayāt kācam vā
netra sparśe netra paryanta adhastāt muktā
mukha sparśe keśam kāṣṭham vā tri kara adhare
danta sparśāt tribhiḥ hastaiḥ dantam anumīyate

original: karṇakaṇḍūyane karṇāntādhastād rūpyaṁ suvarṇaṁ vidrumaṁ vā bhavet |
analyzed: karṇa kaṇḍūyane karṇa anta adhastāt rūpyam suvarṇam vidrumam vā bhavet
gala sparśena tad pramāṇa adhas kaṇṭhikā loha aśṛṅkhalā vā
mārjāra kaṅkālam vā tri kara adhare
a sa sparśe tad pramāṇa adhare tad ābharaṇam
kakṣa sparśe kakṣa anta adhas loham
bāhu pīḍane kaṇṭha pramāṇa adhare tat ābharaṇam

original: dakṣiṇakarasparśe kaṭimātrādhaḥ pṛṣṭha kapālaṁ mnmayakapālaṁ vā |
analyzed: dakṣiṇa kara sparśe kaṭi mātra adhas pṛṣṭha kapālam vā
vāma hasta sparśe jānu mātra adhas khaṭvā pādaḥ
pārśva kaṇḍūyane nara ardha mātrā adhas dhūlī
uraḥ sparśe kaṭi mātra adhas paśukīkasam
pṛṣṭha sparśe pṛṣṭha asthi tad pramāṇa adhas
kaṭi sparśe dvi kara adhas pradeśe lohakaṇṭakam
liṅga sparśena hasta pramāṇa adhare triloha śalyam
jaṅghā sparśe tad asthi ekādaśa aṅgula adhare
gulpha sparśe aṣṭādaśa aṅgula adhare aśvakhuraḥ
pāda sparśāt dvādaśa aṅgula adhare śālmalī kaṇṭakaḥ vā
pāda kaniṣṭhā aṅgulī sparśe aṣṭa aṅgula adhare kāsyam
pārṣṇi sparśe dvādaśa aṅgula adhare abhrakam

original: [5] sūtrapātanasamaye yajamānasya pārśve sthitvā kenacid anyena puruṣeṇa yasya prāṇino nāma saṁkīrtyate tadasthi tatrāstīti niścayaḥ |
analyzed: sūtra pātana samaye yajamānasya pārśve sthitvā kenacid anyena puruṣeṇa yasya prāṇinaḥ nāma sa kīrtyate tat asthi tatra asti iti niścayaḥ

original: [6] akasmād gaur āgatya yadi viṣṭhām utsṛjati tadadho'vaśyaṁ tatpramāṇaṁ kanakam astīti niścīyate |
analyzed: akasmāt gauḥ āgatya yadi viṣṭhām utsṛjati tad adhas avaśyam tad pramāṇam kanakam asti iti niścīyate

original: yady akasmād āgatya purīṣam utsṛjati bālakumārikā tadā tadadho'vaśyaṁ tatpramāṇaṁ rūpyaṁ bhavet |
analyzed: yadi akasmāt āgatya purīṣam utsṛjati bāla kumārikā tadā tad adhas avaśyam tad pramāṇam rūpyam bhavet
bheka rutena jala bhayam
śuka śārikā hamsa kokila mayūra jīva jīvaka cakravāka vṛṣabhāṇām hṛdya upakūjanam kalyāṇāya bhavati
siha gaja megha manojña svanaḥ dhana dhānya artha lābha udayāya bhavati
śaṅkha maṅgala gītikā bāla krīḍanaiḥ artha āptiḥ
dhūma darśane cittapīḍa
hīna dīna vyādhi paripīḍita jana darśane rogaḥ
dhvaja chatra patākā madya māsa ghaṇṭā alaṅkāra ambhoja dadhīndra vahni jvālā phala mīna yuga rāja aṅganā ādīnām sa darśane śubham bhavati
vidvat brāhmaṇa bhikṣu sādhu janānām sadarśane dharmaḥ syāt
iti nimitta uktiḥ
drawing the lines

original: tad anu kṛtasūtrapātana ācāryo janadhanabalavivṛddhaye savajradakṣiṇakareṇa suvarṇaśalākikām ādāya,
analyzed: tat anu kṛta sūtra pātanaḥ ācāryaḥ jana dhana bala vivṛddhaye sa vajra dakṣiṇa kareṇa suvarṇa śalākikām ādāya
aiśānyām diśam ārabhya dakṣiṇa āvartena diś sūtreṣu ullikhet
tathā eva ghaṇṭā sahita vāma kareṇa mūla sūtreṣu ullikhet
